meaningMnemonic: If you're <kanji>confused</kanji> and you make a <kanji>mistake</kanji>, no matter how much you didn't mean it, it's still a <vocabulary>mistake</vocabulary>. You should ask for help next time you don't know what you're doing and you won't make these <vocabulary>error</vocabulary>s.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
